name: WeatherDisplayPanel
description: A component type designed to display current weather conditions, specifically current temperature and 'feels like' temperature.

name: TextDisplay
description: A component type for displaying general text content.

name: IconDisplay
description: A component type for displaying an icon based on a source.

name: TextInput
description: An input field for text entry, used for searching locations.

name: SearchResultsList
description: A list component to display search results, where each item can be selected.

name: LocationSearchButton
description: A button component to initiate a location search or manage locations.

name: HourlyForecastSummaryPanel
description: A panel displaying a summary of the hourly weather forecast.

name: HourlyForecastList
description: A list displaying detailed hourly weather data.

name: Daily Forecast Summary Panel
description: A panel displaying a summary of the daily weather forecast.

name: Daily Forecast List
description: A list displaying daily weather forecast items.

name: Button
description: A generic clickable button with a label and style.

name: Icon
description: A generic icon component.

name: Reorder Handle
description: A draggable handle used to reorder items in a list.

name: Carousel
description: A component to display a series of items, one at a time, with navigation controls.

name: ErrorMessageToast
description: A temporary, dismissible toast message for displaying errors.

name: Manage Locations Button
description: A button to navigate to the location management screen.

name: Saved Location List Item
description: A list item displaying saved location details with an editable icon.

name: Text Input Field
description: A generic text input field for user entry.

name: Save Changes Button
description: A button to save changes made in a form.

name: BackButton
description: A button to navigate back to the previous screen.

name: List
description: A list component to display multiple items, such as saved locations.

name: ListItem
description: A generic list item that can display text, an icon, and optional action buttons, including a delete button.

name: PersistentInfoBanner
description: A persistent banner for displaying important information or alerts, with optional actions and dismissibility.

name: IconButton
description: A button with an icon, used for navigation or actions.

name: SettingItem
description: A generic setting item in a list, typically with a label and an optional value or action.

name: RadioGroup
description: A group of radio buttons where only one option can be selected at a time.

name: Toggle
description: A UI switch to toggle settings on or off.

name: Slider
description: A UI control for selecting a value from a range.

name: Radar Map Button
description: A button to navigate to the real-time radar map.

name: Interactive Radar Map
description: An interactive map component displaying real-time weather radar data.

name: Radar Map Card
description: A card component on the dashboard to navigate to the interactive radar map.

name: Time Scrubber
description: A component to scrub through time, typically used for animations or historical data.

name: CalendarInput
description: A calendar input for selecting a single date.

name: Checkbox
description: A selectable checkbox for toggling options.

name: ChartDisplay
description: A component to display various types of data charts.

name: Alert Detail Content
description: Displays the full details of a weather alert, including its type, severity, description, affected areas, and recommended actions.

name: Location Header
description: A component to display the current geographical location prominently, typically used in a header.

name: LoadingIndicator
description: A visual indicator to show that content is loading or an action is in progress.

name: AlertDialog
description: A modal dialog for displaying alerts or error messages, typically with a title, message, and action buttons.
